column3: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.

The biggest job we have is to teach a newly hired employee how to fail intelligently. We have to train him to experiment over and over and to keep on trying and failing until he learns what will work.
To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
Nothing will work unless you do.
Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work.
I thought the attractions of being an astronaut were actually, not so much the Moon, but flying in a completely new medium.
If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work.
To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
Good things happen to those who hustle.
And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy's sleeping? I'm working.
Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard.
Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.

A good job is more than just a paycheck. A good job fosters independence and discipline, and contributes to the health of the community. A good job is a means to provide for the health and welfare of your family, to own a home, and save for retirement.

For me, every day is a new thing. I approach each project with a new insecurity, almost like the first project I ever did. And I get the sweats. I go in and start working, I'm not sure where I'm going. If I knew where I was going I wouldn't do it.
Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you.
Once you start a working on something, don't be afraid of failure and don't abandon it. People who work sincerely are the happiest.

Before you start some work, always ask yourself three questions - Why am I doing it, What the results might be and Will I be successful. Only when you think deeply and find satisfactory answers to these questions, go ahead.
I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
When you form a team, why do you try to form a team? Because teamwork builds trust and trust builds speed.
The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival.
When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed.
